lead_paragraph: 5:19 p.m. | Updated Could all three New York-area teams make the N.H.L. playoffs? Who are the favorites for this season's Hart Trophy? What's wrong with the Blackhawks? Jeff Z. Klein, the N.H.L. reporter for the The New York Times, and Slap Shot contributor Christopher Botta will answer questions from readers. Use the comment field for your questions, and answers will appear on Slap Shot later this week.

headline.main: Have N.H.L. Questions? Slap Shot Has Answers
